transcript: I don't know why, but every time I reach out for something that I really want, I have to pull back because someone else will suffer my whole bloody life, time after time after time.

segments.text: I don't know why, but every time I reach out for something that I really want, I have
to pull back because someone else will suffer my whole bloody life, time after time after

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I don't know why but every time I reach out for something that I really want, I have to pull back 'cause someone else will suffer. My whole bloody life, time after time after time.
